function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of training in COVID-19 signs and symptoms, social distancing, and hygiene practices.","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 spread and infection within the workplace.","Mitigation":"Provide comprehensive training on COVID-19 signs, symptoms, and prevention measures, and enforce adherence to health and safety guidelines.","Technologies":"Online training platforms, virtual reality simulations for hands-on training.","People":"Employees, employers, and on-site workers.","Owner":"Employers and management."},{"Description":"Ineffective communication leading to lack of updates and information for furloughed employees.","Impact":"Furloughed employees feeling disconnected and uncertain about their job status, leading to decreased morale and productivity.","Mitigation":"Maintain regular communication with furloughed employees, provide updates on job status, and offer support and encouragement.","Technologies":"Email communication, video conferencing, employee management software for updates.","People":"Furloughed employees, employers, and HR personnel.","Owner":"Employers and HR personnel."},{"Description":"Reduced productivity and workforce shortages due to challenges faced during remote work, isolation, and lack of equipment.","Impact":"Decreased productivity, work-related stress, and workforce shortages, affecting overall business operations.","Mitigation":"Implement measures to address remote work challenges, provide necessary equipment, and promote mental health support for employees.","Technologies":"Remote work collaboration tools, teleconferencing software, mental health apps.","People":"Remote workers, managers, and employees working from home.","Owner":"Employers and management."}]}
